title: Front-end Developer
responsibilities: Perform complex tasks within limited time frames.
Be available to quickly resolve production issues.
achievements: Integrate a complex design from start to finish.

title: Front-end Developer
responsibilities: Analyze designs and specifications to accurately deliver web projects and applications.
Analyze the functioning of banking calculator equations to reproduce them in JavaScript.
Ensure the proper functioning of projects and applications. Fill Jira tickets as needed.
Participate in daily 'scrum' meetings to inform the team of the latest developments.
Conduct code review sessions with colleagues.
Keep a product up to date.
Participate in client calls to support the project manager with technical formalities.
Perform complex tasks within limited time frames.
achievements: Collaborated on the design of a personalized video product, including an After-effects extension to create modular videos with personalized data.
Created a page that iframes product videos with dynamic resizing based on the user's viewport.
Developed a test page for the personalized video product on Angular, incorporating advanced features and API communication.

demo.title: Test page for the personalized video product.
